text:
@LaraLeaTrump @realDonaldTrump Science says otherwise. Every single study WORLDWIDE has proven that this drug 1 - has no proven significant effect against Covid-19 AND 2 - causes an increase in the risk of heart arhythmia.

Stop spreading shit like that, you will only endanger MORE people than Donny has killed
